title: HElp PLz when i click on league the client shows up but gets very dark an di cant see or click play

replies.body:
It sounds like something may have gone wrong during the upgrade process. I recommend hopping into your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file. Right-click on the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file and select *run as administrator*. This should bypass the issue but you may need to try it a few times before it sticks.

Let me know if this helped!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8uih0c4V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-19T03:39:40.586+0000)
>
> It sounds like something may have gone wrong during the upgrade process. I recommend hopping into your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file. Right-click on the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file and select *run as administrator*. This should bypass the issue but you may need to try it a few times before it sticks.
> 
> Let me know if this helped!

hey i dont see the exe file totally nooby but help plz
Which one? If it was the *LeagueClient.exe* file, this may be a bigger problem. Can you [**screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) what you see in the League client with the dark shade?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8uih0c4V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-12-20T00:41:35.226+0000)
>
> Which one? If it was the *LeagueClient.exe* file, this may be a bigger problem. Can you [**screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) what you see in the League client with the dark shade?

https://i.gyazo.com/808037266265ac0e2043d5fb2211b03f.png

Thanks for providing that screenshot. I recommend we escalate this to our tech team by having you run some logs w/ our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you ran into issues.

Black screens could be the symptom of a number of underlying issues. Firstly, I'd like you to rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.

If this doesn't work, let us know and we'll dive into more solutions. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg
